email.title: Unicode 20/21
email.text:
![Unicode 20/21](https://i.imgur.com/50KYoji.png)
### The Unicode competition is live, with the first challenge now open!
Coders can join the Imperial team here https://app.showcode.io
Join the Showcode community Discord server here https://discord.gg/GWW8UbMW3r
You can find out more about Unicode 20/21 at https://www.showcode.io/unicode/
